about_the_game:
The kingdom of Evergold has spent centuries battling Shadowvale, a nation of dark creatures hell-bent on world domination. As the war raged on, news reached the King of Evergold of a magical artifact hidden in the Mystery Islands, a place populated only by criminals and sinners. An artifact so powerful that it would allow Evergold to finally rid the continent of all evil.

But no matter how many holy knights and heroes the king sent, none of them ever returned. Until one of Evergold's finest minds, the court wizard, hatched a new, desperate plan: Send a band of misfits to blend in with the locals and steal the wondrous artifact! Nothing could possibly go wrong!... Could it?

Will these three outcasts, each with their own past and their own problems, succeed in their mission? Or will they fail miserably, like everyone else before them?

FEATURES

• Beautiful 4K hand drawn environments.

• Intriguing story in a medieval fantasy world.

• 3 controllable characters.

• Amusing turn based combat with cards.

• A variety of clever and balanced puzzles.

• Original soundtrack.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04, Mint 17 or later
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Single Core Processor or 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 1 GB RAM (Shared Memory is not recommended)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.15 Catalina or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Red Moon Kingdom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10 or later
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz (Single Core) or 2 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers

short_description: When a group of outcasts is sent to retrieve a wondrous artifact, a fatal mistake brings chaos upon the world. Explore, solve puzzles and card battle your way through a unique medieval fantasy setting full of magic with 3 controllable characters and in stunning 4K hand-drawn visuals.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Italian
*languages with full audio support
